name: Forever Town Demo
description:
Welcome to Forever Town. Where you're free to never leave. After the town was built on top of a subterranean wizards lair, the town was cursed. None of the residents can leave. If unsuspecting adventurers or merchants wander in, they are stuck in the town forever. 

Yes. This is an RPG Maker game. 

Yes it is made with the base assets

Yes I do plan on improving the full game. This is just 7 levels. It's a first draft if you will

If anyone downloads this, please, leave feedback. Specifically on the difficulty. Does the damage given and taken scale appropriately. I will be buying assets for character models, cut scenes, back grounds, tile sets and more to bring the game itself to fruition.
